subject: Shoppers aren’t waiting - are you? Live webinar with Kick Game & experts
description_text:
Why some shoppers never make it to checkout - and what leading retailers do instead

View in browser (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVC8Kb16MJnxVKCwsB19K174W6N147h5FcRWqM1--ks5n4LbW8wM7ks6lZ3mpVbxV2j6DsPgXW5RrFp-3W4tTNW3pFSNL6tN_yYW3tNkRh2gPqwdW7h6ZPx2Xl-yYW93nlJg4gVkBkV1qHKT1vDrXwW4Qqwym73K3MKW1hq6zR385496W2Cl1Mr778J1VW282XLr4XSvf2W4hk7PG1Nn1NRVJxmw61cvNXnW5JhlNd6wgGlfW2ZXsLD7bs2FfW6hN88x4Z_zd0W3m5cXS4SxpkmW5BmC8N52_VxhVYGfVn6J0jrkW446rYQ7htKZxW7TxCMB3HTFgXW6Qg0mw7Y2zx5W9jWg-f1XcltrW8mp9b54XjwSpW6bkmRN6bmVMXVGYtZx5PyXCxW3dF76C4QQczKW41Rljj1f_C_qW3w1K5D70y1kSW5q0zC337vdlLW6ZCt0W4hZ0xzW6S1wYJ1zNhWGW7K-mm15GmVCpW5SBgxr135snvN5NVkhGfs5DzW3yfb633Xz3P6W56gX6X1YYC6bW93VNkH5pq5f4W5GTf3b6rpgYCW2f0b6H4K_bs4W4x87zJ6nT0qqW4WbBJx3DdNWqMPw0q656Lz_W9hfRml4K04jLf1Q_Cjs04 )

Hello Atto,

Here’s the thing: shoppers move fast. One click can be the difference between a loyal customer and a lost opportunity.

Kick Game, Athos Commerce, Octane AI, and Blend Commerce are rethinking the journey—from first discovery to repeat purchase—and they’re sharing the real-world strategies that make it happen.

Join us live on November 12 for a 45-minute session packed with actionable insights:

- Kick Game — how a top UK retailer meets today’s shopper expectations
- Athos Commerce — strategies to connect discovery to conversion
- Octane AI — using zero-party data to personalize at scale
- Blend Commerce — why checkout and post-purchase matter for long-term growth

No slides. No fluff. Just tactics you can take back to your team—and your questions answered live.

? November 12 | 3 pm BST



Save Your Spot
(https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVC8Kb16MJnxVKCwsB19K174W6N147h5FcRWqM1--jT5n4LbW7lCGcx6lZ3nwW96JdHT8MwYChW8L0JbV28t0hqW4T1zM_4GxPyLW23krZl2jgRZtVj1qgH7M5y70W3Ls3Kr505t20W7hLxqc8wT_8fN5S5lzPT7BqBW5dJDwD1dylCsW45PxhN17bQlMW18PC5q8GHdqVW6Gf5tF42194tW2GDSxl13ZBXxW1FZktR4Y4SdGW4QfQxj6t4QBjW3Hgkqf3fb_tjW7_pznP8J3X7vW2551Bs15JlFgW57wBjz5m_lN2W5288v24k27mrVRpkXP4HThspW3hVSq-96TfgPN76gBJncnb47W57sn073m_fnXW37jNxh6Tj3LcVRXJKH8QgBczW1hfmhL6KhjN8W7TGJdn2F_qccN1B4shDFYhD4W5ntsfP7052ctT5pTQ4TphcnVNHCqx37KZnwN7P1Y6-sDVdmN7LfGY81mwxqW7GbY8S2l15nJW5T3MbG1835VqVql79p7G8_Q7N1Rws2QGPSB8W929pB910BQGZW7S2_PG6ywxbQf3nr02d04 )

See you there,

—Team Athos
